title: The Curious Case of Sherri Papini
description: In 2016, 22 days after Sherri Papini vanished from her home, she reappeared, claiming she’d been kidnapped. The detectives who cracked the case discuss the details with Keith Morrison.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
